thread.title: Reliance Jio Vs Vodafone mobile data plan: A comparison | Zee News
thread.title_full: Reliance Jio Vs Vodafone mobile data plan: A comparison | Zee News

title: Reliance Jio Vs Vodafone mobile data plan: A comparison | Zee News
text:
Ambani said all domestic calls to any network including STD and roaming will continue to be free. Here is a comparison between Vodafone RED plan and Reliance Jio Plan. 
Reliance Jio Plan 
Jio, which marked Ambani's re-entry in telecom space after a decade with free voice calls for life and free data for a promotional period that was extended until March 31, will offer existing users unlimited services for a year at a monthly charge of Rs 303 and one-time membership fee of Rs 99. 
All domestic calls to any network including STD and roaming will continue to be free. 
Vodafone Red Individual Plan 
Vodafone Red Regular Plan 

However, you need to be in 4G city and have 4G compatible device along with 4G SIM to avail Vodafone 4G services. 
First Published: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 17:42 More from zeenews
